name: Xantolo
description:
A tiny top-down exploration game  about the day of the dead celebration made with pico-8.

You wake up from a dream and can't remember anything. Explore your surrondings and interact with your enviroment in order to find out the truth.

Controls

   Use the arrow keys to  move and explore your surroundings

   X and O to interact

How to play

Explore the world around you. Find friends and item on your way home.

Credits

Marroquina- Art and music

NikanCode - Programming

hellacio - Game design and programming
